Tunable.name: MAXIMUM_SHAVE_ANIMATION_RATIO
Tunable.description: The maximum ratio of an animation to shave off. For example, if this is tuned to 2, we will shave off at most 1/2 of the total must-run duration of an animation.

Tunable.name: MAXIMUM_SHAVE_FRAMES_PER_ANIMATION
Tunable.description: The maximum number of frames to shave off of the must-run duration of each animation until we reach a total amount of time debt equal to MAXIMUM_TIME_DEBT.

Tunable.name: MAXIMUM_TIME_DEBT
Tunable.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds to allow the server to run ahead of the client when running a contiguous block of animation/routing to improve blending. Setting this to 0 will disable this feature but ruin blending.
